description: lime green; snout; two openings for eyes either side of ridge; curled tail; three legs; seven slanted top to bottom lines on left side; nine slanted lines right side; short slanted lines above and below left eye; two pointed ears; slotted ridge on top coin slot on right side;
object_name: Pig with ridge on back (or "Fish-Pig") still bank
title: Pig with ridge on back (or "Fish-Pig") still bank
